name: Black Moth Super Rainbow
description: '''Black Moth Super Rainbow''' (occasionally abbreviated as '''BMSR''') is an American [[Psychedelic rock|psychedelic]] [[Electronic music|electronic]] [[Indie pop|indie]] [[Electronics in rock music|rock]] project from [[Pittsburgh]], [[Pennsylvania]], US. BMSR is a solo music project created by Thomas Fec, who is also known as [[Tobacco (musician)|Tobacco]]. Fec writes, records, and produces the work of BMSR independently. In live performances, it features members Tobacco, whose vocals are altered via a [[vocoder]], synth players [[The Seven Fields of Aphelion]] and Pony Diver, drummer Iffernaut, and bassist [[The Hood Internet|STV SLV]].
